[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thematic/core](./core.md) &gt; [Theme](./core.theme.md)

## Theme interface

This is the theme interface applications will use. The main difference from ThemeDefinition will be first-class methods for computing outputs dynamically instead of just returning JSON field values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Theme 
```
